languages.text: {n}Арбитр рычит, словно бешеный зверь:{/n} "Да мне было неприятно даже находиться рядом с тобой! Нет, одна ночь вместе — еще куда ни шло, хотя она не была настолько прекрасной, как ты мог{mf||ла} бы возомнить. Но быть подле тебя постоянно… Мне претила сама мысль, что кто-то может подумать — этот арбитр польстился за статус и богатства и забыл, в чем его долг. А мой долг — следить, чтобы такие как ты не зарывались!"

{n}He growls like a rabid beast:{/n} "I could barely stand even being near you! One night together I could deal with, though it wasn't as amazing as you might like to believe. But to be at your side constantly... It repulsed me to imagine that someone might look at me and think, here is an Arbitrator who was so tempted by status and wealth that he has forgotten his duty. But it IS my duty to keep people like you in line!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр рычит, словно бешеный зверь:{/n} "Да мне было неприятно даже находиться рядом с тобой! А мой долг — следить, чтобы такие как ты не зарывались!"

languages.text: {n}彼は狂った獣のように唸り声を上げた。{/n}「お前の近くにいるだけで、我慢の限界だった！たった一晩だけならまだ耐えられた。とはいえ、お前が思ってるほど素晴らしいものじゃなかったけどな。だが、常にお前のそばにい続けるなんて…地位や富に目がくらみ、義務を忘れたアービトレイターがここにいる、と。誰かにそう思われるかもしれないと想像するだけで虫唾が走った。だが違う！俺の義務は、お前のような人間を正しく従わせることだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}He growls like a rabid beast:{/n} "I could barely stand even being near you! One night together I could deal with, though it wasn't as amazing as you might like to believe. But to be at your side constantly... It repulsed me to imagine that someone might look at me and think, here is an Arbitrator who was so tempted by status and wealth that he has forgotten his duty. But it IS my duty to keep people like you in line!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は狂った獣のように唸り声を上げた。{/n}「お前の近くにいるだけで、我慢の限界だった！たった一晩だけならまだ耐えられた。とはいえ、お前が思ってるほど素晴らしいものじゃなかったけどな。だが、常にお前のそばにい続けるなんて…地位や富に目がくらみ、義務を忘れたアービトレイターがここにいる、と。誰かにそう思われるかもしれないと想像するだけで虫唾が走った。だが違う！俺の義務は、お前のような人間を正しく従わせることだ！」

languages.text: {n}Er knurrt wie eine tollwütige Bestie:{/n} "Ich konnte es kaum ertragen, auch nur in Eurer Nähe zu sein! Mit einer gemeinsamen Nacht kam ich zurecht, obwohl es nicht so toll war, wie Ihr gerne glauben würdet. Aber ständig an Eurer Seite zu weilen ... Die Vorstellung war abstoßend, jemand könnte mich ansehen und denken: 'Das ist ein Arbitrator, den Status und Wohlstand so weit verführt haben, dass er seine Pflicht vergessen hat'. Aber es IST meine Pflicht, Leute wie Euch unter Kontrolle zu halten!"
languages.original_text: {n}He growls like a rabid beast:{/n} "I could barely stand even being near you! One night together I could deal with, though it wasn't as amazing as you might like to believe. But to be at your side constantly... It repulsed me to imagine that someone might look at me and think, here is an Arbitrator who was so tempted by status and wealth that he has forgotten his duty. But it IS my duty to keep people like you in line!"

Mit einer gemeinsamen Nacht kam ich zurecht, obwohl es nicht so toll war, wie Ihr gerne glauben würdet. Aber ständig an Eurer Seite zu weilen ... Die Vorstellung war abstoßend, jemand könnte mich ansehen und denken: 'Das ist ein Arbitrator, den Status und Wohlstand so weit verführt haben, dass er seine Pflicht vergessen hat'. Aber es IST meine Pflicht, Leute wie Euch unter Kontrolle zu halten!"

languages.text: {n}Il laisse échapper un grognement de bête enragée :{/n} « Je ne supporte même pas votre présence ! J'ai toléré de passer une nuit avec vous, même si elle n'était pas aussi fantastique que vous semblez vouloir penser. Mais me trouver constamment à vos côtés... L'idée que quelqu'un pourrait me voir près de vous et penser "Voilà un arbitrator qui a oublié son devoir et cédé à la tentation de la richesse et du prestige !" me répugne au plus haut point. Mais mon devoir est justement de veiller à ce que les gens comme vous respectent la loi ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He growls like a rabid beast:{/n} "I could barely stand even being near you! One night together I could deal with, though it wasn't as amazing as you might like to believe. But to be at your side constantly... It repulsed me to imagine that someone might look at me and think, here is an Arbitrator who was so tempted by status and wealth that he has forgotten his duty. But it IS my duty to keep people like you in line!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il laisse échapper un grognement de bête enragée :{/n} « Je ne supporte même pas votre présence ! J'ai toléré de passer une nuit avec vous, même si elle n'était pas aussi fantastique que vous semblez vouloir penser. Mais me trouver constamment à vos côtés... L'idée que quelqu'un pourrait me voir près de vous et penser "Voilà un arbitrator qui a oublié son devoir et cédé à la tentation de la richesse et du prestige !" me répugne au plus haut point. Mais mon devoir est justement de veiller à ce que les gens comme vous respectent la loi ! »

languages.text: {n}Gruñe como una bestia rabiosa:{/n} «¡Apenas soportaba tenerle cerca! Podría haber superado aquella noche de ser la única, aunque tampoco fue tan espectacular como a usted le gustaría creer. Pero estar constantemente a su lado... Me repugnaba la idea de que alguien me mirase y pensara "he aquí un Arbitrator que se deja seducir por el estatus y la riqueza hasta el punto de olvidar su deber". ¡Pero es que mi deber es precisamente meter en vereda a la gente como usted!».
languages.original_text: {n}He growls like a rabid beast:{/n} "I could barely stand even being near you! One night together I could deal with, though it wasn't as amazing as you might like to believe. But to be at your side constantly... It repulsed me to imagine that someone might look at me and think, here is an Arbitrator who was so tempted by status and wealth that he has forgotten his duty. But it IS my duty to keep people like you in line!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gruñe como una bestia rabiosa:{/n} «¡Apenas soportaba tenerle cerca! Podría haber superado aquella noche de ser la única, aunque tampoco fue tan espectacular como a usted le gustaría creer. Pero estar constantemente a su lado... Me repugnaba la idea de que alguien me mirase y pensara "he aquí un Arbitrator que se deja seducir por el estatus y la riqueza hasta el punto de olvidar su deber". ¡Pero es que mi deber es precisamente meter en vereda a la gente como usted!».

languages.text: {n}他咆哮起来，仿佛疯狂的野兽一般。{/n}“光是在你身边，我就已经快受不了了！如果只是一晚上的话，我倒是还能忍得了，虽然那一晚绝对不像你想得那么美妙。不过，如果一直留在你身边……就肯定会有人来打量我，以为我是那种被地位与财富诱惑的法务官，忘记了自己的职责。光是想想这些，我就要吐出来了，可这就是我的职责！我的责任就是让你这样的人守规矩！”
languages.original_text: {n}He growls like a rabid beast:{/n} "I could barely stand even being near you! One night together I could deal with, though it wasn't as amazing as you might like to believe. But to be at your side constantly... It repulsed me to imagine that someone might look at me and think, here is an Arbitrator who was so tempted by status and wealth that he has forgotten his duty. But it IS my duty to keep people like you in line!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他咆哮起来，仿佛疯狂的野兽一般。{/n}“光是在你身边，我就已经快受不了了！如果只是一晚上的话，我倒是还能忍得了，虽然那一晚绝对不像你想得那么美妙。不过，如果一直留在你身边……就肯定会有人来打量我，以为我是那种被地位与财富诱惑的法务官，忘记了自己的职责。光是想想这些，我就要吐出来了，可这就是我的职责！我的责任就是让你这样的人守规矩！”

languages.text: {n}Kuduz bir hayvan gibi hırlıyor.{/n} "Senin yanında durmaya bile zar zor katlanıyordum! Beraber geçirdiğimiz tek geceyle baş edebilirim. Gerçi o da düşündüğün kadar iyi değildi. Ancak sürekli yanında olmak... Birilerinin bana bakıp 'Şuna bak, statü ve zenginliğin pençesine düşüp görevini unutmuş bir Yargıcı.' diyebileceğini düşünmek midemi bulandırdı. Fakat senin gibileri hizada tutmak BENİM görevimdir!"
languages.original_text: {n}He growls like a rabid beast:{/n} "I could barely stand even being near you! One night together I could deal with, though it wasn't as amazing as you might like to believe. But to be at your side constantly... It repulsed me to imagine that someone might look at me and think, here is an Arbitrator who was so tempted by status and wealth that he has forgotten his duty. But it IS my duty to keep people like you in line!"

Gerçi, o da düşündüğün kadar iyi değildi. Ancak sürekli yanında olmak... Birilerinin bana bakıp 'Şuna bak, statü ve zenginliğin pençesine düşüp görevini unutmuş bir Yargıcı,' diyebileceğini düşünmek midemi bulandırdı. Fakat senin gibileri hizada tutmak BENİM görevimdir!"
